author: jmduarte
body:
- Modified HLT razor filter to allow consuming PF MET 
- HLT razor filter now inherits from HLT Filter class to allow saving online trigger quantities
- More details on the razor triggers for Run 2 can be found at the latest TSG SUSY report https://indico.cern.ch/event/339419/contribution/6/material/slides/0.pdf and SUSY Trigger report https://indico.cern.ch/event/349250/contribution/2/material/slides/0.pdf
  @vlimant
title: Razor hlt filters for run2 development in 72X
